an9.43:1.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, kayasakkhi vutto bhagavata”ti?
an9.43:2.1: Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.43:2.2: Yatha yatha ca tadayatanam tatha tatha nam kayena phusitva viharati.
an9.43:2.3: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, kayasakkhi vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.43:3.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam …
an9.43:3.4: Yatha yatha ca tadayatanam tatha tatha nam kayena phusitva viharati.
an9.43:3.5: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, kayasakkhi vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.43:4.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.43:4.2: Yatha yatha ca tadayatanam tatha tatha nam kayena phusitva viharati.
an9.43:4.3: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, kayasakkhi vutto bhagavata pariyayena …pe….
an9.43:5.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.43:5.2: Yatha yatha ca tadayatanam tatha tatha nam kayena phusitva viharati.
an9.43:5.3: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, kayasakkhi vutto bhagavata nippariyayena”ti.
